modal.title: Create Project
modal.description: Create a new project for your services.

name.title: Project Name
name.description: The name of project. Only alphabet, numbers and dash allowed.

icon.title: Project Icon
icon.description: The image URL of project icon. (Optional)

description.title: Description
description.description: The description text of this project. Will show in the project list page. (Optional)

delete.title: Delete Project
delete.description: If you delete project, all services and itsâ€™ data will permanently removed and cannot recover.

leave.title: Leave Project
leave.description: If you leave project, you will lose access to this project until you are invited again.

overview.description: You will receive email notification when monthly cost reaches 80% of budget. When cost over budget your services in project will suspended automatically to prevent extra billing.
